name: Cube Dodge
description:
• This is an arcade-style casual game;

• The player has his score increased over time;
• To keep the score increasing, the player needs to dodge a rain of bombs that fall non-stop and collect bonus lives that drop every 15 seconds.

Game features:

• Bonuses to increase speed and lives that help the game's performance;

• Score multiplier bonus up to 10 times over time during a match;
• Increased amount and speed of bombs that fall over time, making the game more challenging during a match;
• Relaxing soundtrack and pleasant sound effects;
• Various visual effects and changes in brightness according to 4 (four) phases of the day: morning, noon, afternoon and night, for visual satisfaction and game contemplation;
• A book with ancient wisdom in the pause menu, translated into three languages ​​(Portuguese (Brazil), Spanish and English);
• 443 Toy-based Skins, with 22 skins unlocked with the maximum score obtained in matches;
• The game saves your overall record and keeps the maximum score achieved.
